subject: NIGERIAN NATIONAL PETROLEUM
body:
NIGERIAN NATIONAL PETROLEUM CORPORATION
                      7, kofo Abayomi street Victorian island-Lagos
                                            Tel: 2348068570439
SIR
We receive instruction from the new president that all contractors
that are due to receive their payment will receive their fund through
MASTER  CARD payment system, You are required to reconfirm your
information to enable us commence the processing of your fund into
your account. You are advice to stop every communication with any body
or group of people regarding to this payment. Your urgent attention is
needed in regards to this payment.
I wait from your prompt response.
Yours faithfully
Dr. Uzoma  Oyeze
Chairman Contract Award Division (NNPC)

subject: Re:   NIGERIAN NATIONAL PETROLEUM
body:
Dear Dr. Uzoma Oyeze,

Thank you for your email. However, I believe there may be some misunderstanding as I am not expecting any payment from the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation.

Could you please provide more details about this matter?

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: NIGERIAN NATIONAL PETROLEUM
body:
NIGERIAN NATIONAL PETROLEUM CORPORATION
                                    7, kofo Abayomi street Victorian
island-Lagos
                                                    Tel: 2347066258650
                                             Email:  nnpcn7507@gmail.com


TO   Deborah

I acknowledge the receipt of your mail dated of  Subject  2024 and the
content well noted, it was due to much work in my office concerning all the
contractors.You are advice with immediate effect to reconfirmed to this
office, your contract information and banking details for immediate
reconciliation of your files and also see attached copy of contractors fund
release application, fill out the space and return back to this office to
enable us commence action on transfer of your fund.

Thanks for your cooperation

Yours faithfully

Dr. Uzoma  Oyeze
Chairman Contract Award Division (NNPC)

subject: Re: NIGERIAN NATIONAL PETROLEUM
body:
NIGERIAN NATIONAL PETROLEUM CORPORATION
                                    7, kofo Abayomi street Victorian
island-Lagos
                                                    Tel: 2347066258650
                                             Email:  nnpcn7507@gmail.com


TO   Deborah

Good day can I trust you because I know that you are not the right
beneficiary of this compensation  according to your email which you send to
me that you were not expecting any money from Nigeria but I can trust you
because I want both of us to do business and if they transfer this fund
into your account that you will not run away with the money don't worry I
will provide the necessary documents backing the fund and I repeat myself
again I believe I can trust you.get back to me.


Thanks for your cooperation

Yours faithfully

Dr. Uzoma  Oyeze
Chairman Contract Award Division (NNPC)
